<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pendant of the Occult](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3098)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 293 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This amulet is hollow and shaped in the form of an unblinking eye. Its cavity typically holds some fragment of occult text. While wearing the pendant, you gain a +1 item bonus to Occultism checks, and you can cast the guidance cantrip as an occult innate spell.

</column>
